document.full_text: the australian dollar hit a fresh 29-year high and south korea's benchmark share index touched another record intraday high on monday, suggesting investors were still eager to embrace risk and higher-yielding assets.
document.title: aussie dollar hits 29-year peak; seoul shares shine
lines_and_colors: the australian dollar hit a fresh 29-year high and south korea's benchmark share index touched another record intraday high on monday, suggesting investors were still eager to embrace risk and higher-yielding assets.
